recipes.name: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta in salted water
2. Fry bacon until crispy
3. Beat eggs with cheese
4. Drain pasta, reserve water
5. Mix hot pasta with egg mixture
6. Add bacon and toss
7. Season with pepper
8. Serve immediately

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.instructions:
1. Roll out pizza dough
2. Spread tomato sauce
3. Add mozzarella slices
4. Drizzle olive oil
5. Bake at 250°C for 10 minutes
6. Add fresh basil
7. Serve hot

recipes.name: Risotto
recipes.instructions:
1. Heat stock in separate pan
2. Sauté rice in butter
3. Add wine and stir
4. Add stock gradually
5. Stir continuously
6. Add parmesan and butter
7. Serve creamy

recipes.name: Ribollita
recipes.instructions:
Prepare and measure all ingredients.
Follow traditional regional preparation (sauté/braise/simmer/ bake as appropriate).
Cook main proteins or vegetables until tender and flavored.
Combine components (pasta, sauce, risotto, etc.) and finish with cheese/herbs where typical.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot.
